title: How to Earn a Refurbishing Badge in Animal Crossing: New Leaf

steps.headline: Look at the Refurbish Badge.
steps.description:
You will need to have Cyrus refurbish items. Bronze rank: 30 items refurbished
Silver rank: 100 items refurbished
Gold rank: 200 items refurbished

steps.headline: Locate Phineas.
steps.description: When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days.

steps.headline: Talk to him.
steps.description: At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons.

steps.headline: View your badge on your Town Pass Card.
steps.description: Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.

text:
Look at the Refurbish Badge. You will need to have Cyrus refurbish items. Bronze rank: 30 items refurbished
Silver rank: 100 items refurbished
Gold rank: 200 items refurbished Accomplish the minimum amount required.  Locate Phineas. When a player achieves the minimum for a level, Phineas will appear somewhere in town on clear days. Talk to him. At times, he'll give you multiple badges, so just keep pressing buttons. View your badge on your Town Pass Card. Learn that ranks override each other, so if you achieve a bronze, a silver one will override it instead of showing both ranks.
